segments.text: I notice the woman is completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flooding the floor, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are sneaking cookies like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a circus act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while her brother is about to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know whether to laugh or scream.
segments.speaker: PAR
